title: APIARY - Links to other docs in the blueprint

cells.data: Â if you have links to other docs in the blueprint, don't create them using markdown syntax - instead use HTML and include the attribute target="_blank" e.g. <a href="//foo.com" target="_blank">Foo Doc</a> -- the _blank target opens the link in a new tab or window -- if we open in same window, results are bad for embedded version of the doc
